meanings.sent1: The old socks in the gym locker emitted a rankish odor.
meanings.sent2: The garbage left out for days started to smell rankish.
meanings.sent3: The rankish smell from the fish market made everyone hold their noses.
meanings.sent4: The rankish stench of the swamp lingered in the air.
meanings.sent5: The rankish aroma of the cheese filled the room with an overpowering scent.

meanings.sent1: The spoiled milk had a rankish taste that made me gag.
meanings.sent2: The medicine had a bitter and rankish flavor.
meanings.sent3: The rankish taste of the medicine made it hard to swallow.
meanings.sent4: The rankish flavor of the dish left a lingering unpleasantness in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The rankish aftertaste of the coffee was hard to ignore.

meanings.sent1: The rankish smell of rotten eggs filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The bathroom had a rankish odor after not being cleaned for weeks.
meanings.sent3: The rankish odor of the skunk made everyone run for cover.
meanings.sent4: The rankish stench of the garbage bin wafted through the alley.
meanings.sent5: The rankish scent of the flowers was overpowering in the small room.
